textBeforeTable: Business VOIP Providers Business Hosted PBX Providers A business hosted PBX phone system can reduce your monthly phone bill tremendously compared to a traditional business phone system. As is characteristic of a hosted PBX system, the PBX is hosted offsite at the provider's facilities. Below is a list of hosted PBX for business providers. Hosted PBX is a service where the call platform and PBX features are hosted at the service provider location. The business end users connect via IP to the provider for voice service.
